name: Jammed Controls
description:
Airplane games with well functioning flying controls can be so dull. I think we can all agree, flying controls that jam in only one direction are so much more thrilling. Add lightning and various other mechanical problems…now you’ve got a game!

Jammed Controls is all about flying your damaged plane with a series of loops. Loops and more loops! Get struck by lightning and watch your controls get jammed the opposite direction. This is a one button retro-style game that will test your reflexes and strategy skills. Solve each level by navigating around a multitude of flying and floating obstacles with carefully timed loops. Only the most skilled pilots will arrive safely at the airport to the great relief of motion-sick passengers. The game is quick to learn, but difficult to master.

Developed by NationLocation Games, makers of the wildly popular web game City Jumper™ in collaboration with Radical Retro Games.
